it.zavo.maze.maze
Class Maze

java.lang.Object
  it.zavo.maze.maze.Maze

public class Maze
extends Object

Represents the maze. Contains the ball, the walls and the holes.

Author:
Marco Mandrioli

Constructor Summary
Maze(GL10 gl, Context context, int resId)
          Constructs a new maze from an XML file.

Constructor Detail

Maze

public Maze(GL10 gl,
            Context context,
            int resId)
Constructs a new maze from an XML file.

Parameters:
gl - the GL object.
context - the context in which the resource is.
resId - the resource ID of the XML file containing the maze data.
Method Detail

checkHolesCollision

public Status checkHolesCollision(float[] position)
Checks if the ball is colliding with an hole of the maze and returns the according application status.

Parameters:
position - an array of two floats that contains the coordinates of the ball (x, y).
Returns:
GAME_OK if no collision is found, LEVEL_LOST if collided with a normal hole, LEVEL_COMPLETE if collided with the goal.
See Also:
Status

checkWallsCollisions

public boolean checkWallsCollisions(float[] position,
                                    float[] speed,
                                    float[] acceleration,
                                    float bounceReduction)
Checks if the ball is colliding with a wall of the maze.

Parameters:
position - an array of two floats that contains the coordinates of the ball (x, y).
speed - the actual speed of the ball.
acceleration - the actual acceleration of the ball.
bounceReduction - a constant coefficient representing the speed reduction of the ball when it bounces against a wall.
Returns:
true if a collision is detected, false otherwise.
See Also:
Status

draw

public void draw(GL10 gl,
                 float ballX,
                 float ballY)
Draws the entire maze structure, with the ball at the specified coordinates.

Parameters:
gl - the GL object.
ballX - the x coordinate of the ball.
ballY - the y coordinate of the ball.

getBallRadius

public float getBallRadius()
Returns the radius of the ball.

Returns:
the radius of the ball.

getBallSpeed

public float getBallSpeed()
Returns the speed multiplier of the ball.

Returns:
the speed multiplier of the ball.

getStart

public float[] getStart()
Return the starting coordinates of the ball in this maze.

Returns:
an array of two floats representing the x and y coordinates of the starting point.
